hero.title: Parsa Shaabani
hero.description: 🚀 Hi, I’m Parsa Shaabani — a passionate full-stack developer crafting modern web apps with React, Next.js, Tailwind & APIs. 💡 I love turning ideas into clean, functional code and designing projects that blend creativity with performance. 🌐 Explore my portfolio to see innovation, growth & passion in action!
